spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent adherence to the complex floor plan layout including room adjacencies and wall alignments. Most doors and windows are placed correctly according to the blueprint. Minor proportional deviations in the kitchen and master bedroom depth.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are accounted for, including small toilet areas and balconies. The roof is removed correctly and the model sits on a dark neutral background without UI clutter. Slight structural reinterpretation of the utility area near the kitchen (closed off instead of open).

furniture_mapping.notes: Good block-style representation. Dining table, sofas, and beds match the plan locations well. Some smaller fixtures like the desks in Bed 2 and Bed 3 are simplified or missing details.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Complies well with the low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. The lighting is soft and ambient. The camera angle is isometric, though slightly narrower than a perfect 45-degree top-down view.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen and Utility area layout slightly distorted compared to the 2D plan dimensions.
Missing specific desk units and circular chair details in Bedroom 2 and Bedroom 3.
Minor structural reinterpretation of the external utility wall and entrance foyer depth.
